See the example in directory `chord/examples/datarace_test/` of the Chord distribution. The `README` file in that directory explains how to run the datarace checker on the example. The datarace checker upon successful completion should produce files [http://chord.stanford.edu/examples/datarace_test/dataraces_by_fld.html dataraces_by_fld.html] and [http://chord.stanford.edu/examples/datarace_test/dataraces_by_obj.html dataraces_by_obj.html].
